Reviews.Title: Reviews of Monster M7
Reviews.Author: sista big bone
Reviews.Content: I really loved it! My baby loved it more than I did! How about that! I only wished that it was more sturdy than it is!

Reviews.Title: one star is one too many for this tablet
Reviews.Author: roman a diaz
Reviews.Content: within the first week, the adapter piece for power on the device fell out. The piece is so cheap that it came out of the tablet with no force.

Reviews.Title: Like it !
Reviews.Author: Tommy
Reviews.Content: Does a nice job in the truck plugged into the cig.lighter and the Aux on the car stereo. I use it basically for "Spotify To Go", Youtube and Google. Get a 'case' these don't take drops kindly.
